document.masterDocTitle: New country records of caddisflies (Insecta: Trichoptera) from Vietnam

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New country records of caddisflies (Insecta: Trichoptera) from Vietnam

bibRefCitation.author: Malicky, H.
bibRefCitation.refString: Malicky, H. 1999. Neue Kocherfliegen aus Europa, Asien und von den Seychellen. Braueria 26: 44 - 48.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined :
Lao Cai :
ca.
4 km W Sapa Village
, on tributary of Golden River ,
1200 m
,
22 o 18’59"N
,
103 o 49’16"E
, Malaise trap ,
16-23 May 1999
, A. Lathrop , ROM 992020 , 1 male
;
Quang Nam :
Ngoc Linh :
830 m
,
15 o 10’N
,
108 o 5’E
, Malaise trap ,
11-18 March 1999
, K. Long , C. Johnson , AMNH , 1 male
;
950 m
,
15 o 10’N
,
108 o 5’E
, Malaise trap ,
23 March 1999
, K. Long , C. Johnson , AMNH , 1 male
;
ibid.
16 April 1999
, 4 males
.
Distribution : Thailand , Vietnam ( Lao Cai , Quang Nam ).

bibRefCitation.author: Malicky, H. & P. Chantaramongkol

,
